word: The great Teacher, while on this earth, gave His whole life to teach us how to work as devoted, consecrated missionaries for God. In the prayer that He offered for His disciples just before His trial and crucifixion, He declared, "I have glorified Thee on the earth; I have finished the work which Thou gavest Me to do.....I have manifested Thy name unto the men which Thou gavest Me out of the world."
